thread.section_title: Greatmats Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greatmats | www.greatmats.com | 2 of 122
thread.title: thomas bowen

author: thomas bowen
title: thomas bowen
text:
I found a certain color combination of foam floor panels at Greatmats that I could find before. I ordered a bulk of 15 mats which were delivered in a timely fashion, as were a second order (again 15). They stayed in touch throughout the shipping process. Mats arrived in perfect shape and are of high quality. Colors were exactly the same as on website.
I had a very positive experience with Greatmats and will be back.
